logic

Class Pawn

  • java.lang.Object
    • logic.Piece
      • logic.Pawn

  • public class Pawn
extends Piece
    A class representing the classical chess-piece of a pawn. Extended from Piece.
    Author:
    Moritz Rehschuh

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected int enPassantCounter
      If this value is greater then zero, then this piece can be slain by an EnPassant-move.

      • getPossibleMoves

        public Pos[] getPossibleMoves(boolean advancedSearch)
        Description copied from class: Piece
        A method to calculate all possible moves, the piece can make at the current moment.
        Specified by:
        getPossibleMoves in class Piece
        Parameters:
        advancedSearch - If this boolean is set to true, the method will filter out all moves, that will put yourself in a check-situation.
        Returns:
        A Pos-array of all possible moves.

      • triggerEvent

        protected void triggerEvent(Pos target)
        Description copied from class: Piece
        This method will trigger any additional data-manipulations, needed after moving this piece.
        Specified by:
        triggerEvent in class Piece
        Parameters:
        target - The target-Pos, that the piece has moved to.

      • equals

        public boolean equals(Piece piece)
        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • modifyArguments

        private void modifyArguments(boolean firstMove,
                             int enPassantCounter)
        An internal method to modify the values of a cloned instance of a pawn.
        Parameters:
        firstMove - Has the pawn been moved before?
        enPassantCounter - The wanted value of the enPassantCounter.

      • setUpgradeOverride

        protected void setUpgradeOverride(java.lang.String override)
        A method to set an upgrade-override for the next move. This String will be passed on to sendPromotionChoice()-method, overriding the calling of the choosePromotion()-menu. This override will expire after the next move and be replaced by a null.
        Parameters:
        override - The override-String, that should be either: "Queen", "Rook", "Bishop" or "Knight".

        Description copied from class: Piece
        Returns an identical copy of this Object.

        clone in class Piece
